block_comment: This block of code functions as a register for action initiation in a synchronous digital system. It specifically controls the commencement of read operations. The `always @( posedge i_wb_clk )` statement implementation signifies that this control is synchronized with the system's clock's positive edge transitions, thereby ensuring consistency and synchronization within the system. On every rising edge of the clock signal ('i_wb_clk'), the register value is updated with the current value of the 'start_read' signal.
